law.catch_line: A person who violates any provision of § 18-301 or § 18-302 of this subtitle is guilty of a misdem...
law.text: A person who violates any provision of § 18-301 or § 18-302 of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $5,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 5 years or both.
